name: July
description:
Time is Everything

He is a detective, early in his thirties, lives in a small yet comfy house.

Outgoing and warm-hearted, she lives in a small yet comfy house as well. 

Except 2 days later, she's about to die.

This game is still in development, I really like to explore the possibility of environmental storytelling. So stay in tune if I or Rosaita make some updates ;)
